001package gust.backend.transport;
002
003import io.grpc.ClientInterceptor;
004
005import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009
010/**
011 * Specifies transport configuration properties specific to gRPC {@link io.grpc.ManagedChannel} objects.
012 */
013public interface GrpcTransportConfig extends PooledTransportConfig, GrpcTransportCredentials {
014  /** Default maximum inbound message size, if no other value is specified. */
015  Integer DEFAULT_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE = 1;
016
017  /** Default maximum inbound metadata size, if no other value is specified. */
018  Integer DEFAULT_MAX_INBOUND_METADATA_SIZE = 1;
019
020  /** Whether to prime managed gRPC connections by default. */
021  Boolean DEFAULT_PRIME_CONNECTIONS = true;
022
023  /**
024   * @return gRPC endpoint at which to connect to the target service.
025   */
026  @Nonnull String endpoint();
027
028  /**
029   * @return Whether to keep-alive even when there is no activity.
030   */
031  @Nonnull Boolean getKeepAliveNoActivity();
032
033  /**
034   * @return Max inbound message size, in bytes.
035   */
036  default @Nonnull Integer maxInboundMessageSize() {
037    return DEFAULT_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * @return Max inbound metadata stanza size, in bytes.
042   */
043  default @Nonnull Integer maxInboundMetadataSize() {
044    return DEFAULT_MAX_INBOUND_METADATA_SIZE;
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * @return Additional client-side call interceptors to install.
049   */
050  default @Nonnull Optional<List<ClientInterceptor>> getExtraInterceptors() {
051    return Optional.empty();
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * @return Whether to prime managed gRPC connections.
056   */
057  default @Nonnull Boolean enablePrimer() {
058    return DEFAULT_PRIME_CONNECTIONS;
059  }
060}
